questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened…?

answers.answer: This holiday taked place at Haïti. I went there with my father to join my mother and my all familly which live there. I did a lot of visit, I prepared some delicious local meals with my mother, I followed some latina dance in a dance school, and I saw some of my Haitian friends . I travelled inside the country to see the dommages wich were caused by the earth attack in Port Au Prince the capital, a few years after the catastrophe there still were some miserables lifestyles.
